item.title: Medabots Card Robattle RB announced for Switch
item.content:encoded:
• Switch

Due out on June 25 in Japan.

Imagineer has announced card battle game Medabots Card Robattle RB for Switch. It will launch on June 25 in Japan in Kabuto and Kuwagata versions for 5,478 yen each. A Deluxe Edition containing both versions will be available for 17,600 yen.

In addition to both versions of the game, the Deluxe Edition also includes an 80-page “Complete Card Book” guide, the two-player card game “Medabots Card Game RB Kabuto Version / Kuwagata Version” (with play mat and markers), and a “Sound Collection” CD featuring 30 songs and one bonus track, all housed in a deluxe box.

Here is an overview of the game, via its official website:

Medabots x Card Game

A new Robattle where ingenuity and strategy collide is about to begin!

The history and excitement built up by Medafighters.

That story now begins anew as a card game.

Three Modes

  • Versus Battle – From friends to unmet rivals, challenge other players in both “Network” and “Local” battles.
  • Robattle Challenge – Challenge Medacardfighters awaiting you in a variety of terrains, including forests and rocky areas. Build your strategy based on the terrain and your opponent’s deck.
  • Robattle Tower – Aim for continued victory and battle your way to the top of Robattle Tower! The Medacardfighters and terrain on each floor change at random each time you play, so choose a deck that best suits the situation. There are four towers, each corresponding to a difficulty level (“Easy,” “Normal,” “Hard,” and “Endless.”) If you lose, you will start again from the first floor.

Collect Cards and Form a Strategy for Victory

  • Collect Medabots, Parts, Tactics, Medafighters, Medaforce, and more—gather from over 400 cards to build your own unique deck.
  • The flow of battle can shift dramatically depending on what cards you use and when you use them. Utilize each Medabot’s unique abilities and traits to win!
  • A single move can determine the outcome—a card game experience unique to Medabots!

Version Differences

In Medabots Card Robattle RB Kabuto Version, players will receive a shooting-type deck after completing the tutorial at the start of the game. In Medabots Card Robattle RB Kuwagata Version, players will receive a fighting-type deck. Additionally, there are some cards that are exclusive to each version. These cards can be obtained in the other version via Versus Battle mode.

Watch the announcement teaser trailer below.

Announce Teaser Trailer

item.title: Magical Princess launches this spring
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Demo surpasses 30,000 downloads.

Daughter raising simulation game Magical Princess will launch for PC via Steam this spring, publisher and developer MAGI Inc., and developer Neotro announced. It will support English, Japanese, and Simplified Chinese language options.

The November 2025-released demo has surpassed 30,000 demo downloads, with user reviews being over 97 percent positive.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Raise the cutest daughter in all of the land in the ultimate parenting simulation!

In Magical Princess, step into the shoes of a single, widowed father as he brings up his only beloved daughter from early childhood all the way to graduation at the magical academy.

With her whole life ahead of her across a variety of different paths, how she grows up and matures is entirely your responsibility. Steer her towards an upright academic career as an ace student, a life of excitement on the stage as an idol, the way of the mighty warrior who takes up the sword, or even pure villainy as the demon queen. With every choice and decision you make, her future changes dramatically!

Key Features

  • Complete freedom to raise your daughter however you see fit. Whether that means letting her attend classes, do part-time jobs, go out on dates, sneak out at night, or even indulge in the occasional thievery and other such “odd” jobs, the choice is yours!
  • An enormous amount of story content including over 200 date scenes and over 50 endings. Interact with a colorful cast of more than 30 characters brimming with personality as your daughter leads her life at the magical academy.
  • Uncover deep mysteries lurking beneath the surface. On nights when the full moon turns crimson in the strange phenomenon known as the Crimson Moon, monsters strike in a world seemingly chained to its fate. The key to unlocking everything just might rest in the hands of your daughter…

A Character Raising Game Fit for a Princess!

Magical Princess is a character raising game unlike any other, where players get to experience the joys of raising a daughter full of potential, becoming more attached the more that she grows. What life has in store for her is up to you as you piece together a story of epic proportions! The only question is: are you ready to be a father?

Watch a new trailer below.

Release Window Trailer
